app.name: Bag end catering helper
app.short_description: Sugar and spice and all things nice
app.long_description: Bagginses and Boffins, Tooks and Brandybucks, Grubbs, Chubbs, Hornblowers, Bolgers, Bracegirdles and Proudfoots.
app.installation_instructions: Hold your breath, try not to sneeze.  Catering, now that's a right wheeze.  Find a tomato and give it a good squeeze.  Place your friends and compatriots at their ease.  Finally, spin right round baby right round like a record baby right round round round.  Then click the install button.
